sentences.en: Birds scratch, and some eat stones and grit.
sentences.cn: 鸟用爪抓地面, 有些甚至啄食石块和沙砾.

sentences.en: Clearing out the wilderness by the Nolachucky River took grit and gumption.
sentences.cn: 沿诺兰查基河开拓荒野需要的是勇气和本事.

sentences.en: Grit from the highway made him cough.
sentences.cn: 公路上扬起的沙子呛得他咳嗽起来。

sentences.en: He felt tiny bits of grit and sand peppering his knees.
sentences.cn: 他感到细小的沙砾不断打在膝盖上。

sentences.en: I had a piece of grit in my eye.
sentences.cn: 我眼睛里进了一粒沙子。

sentences.en: I pretended to rub a fleck of grit from one eye.
sentences.cn: 我假装拭去一只眼睛里的沙粒。

sentences.en: I want grits with my eggs instead of hash browns.
sentences.cn: 我想要粗玉米粉加鸡蛋而不是土豆煎饼。

sentences.en: I've got some 〔 a piece of 〕 grit in my shoe.
sentences.cn: 我的鞋里进了些〔一粒〕沙子.

sentences.en: If they gave gold medals for grit, Karen would be right up there on the winners' podium.
sentences.cn: 如果他们颁发毅力金牌，卡伦应该站在领奖台上。

sentences.en: It is advisable to mix coarse grit into heavy soil to improve drainage.
sentences.cn: 建议将粗砂掺到黏重的土壤里，以提高排水性能。

sentences.en: Just grit your teeth and hang on – it’ll be over soon.
sentences.cn: 咬紧牙关坚持下去吧——事情很快会过去的。

sentences.en: Mountaineering in a blizzard needs a lot of grit.
sentences.cn: 在暴风雪中登山需要极大的勇气和毅力.

sentences.en: She works overtime with her vacuum cleaner to keep grit out of the kitchen.
sentences.cn: 她动用真空吸尘器力争不让厨房出现沙砾。

sentences.en: The grit beneath her soles grated harshly on the wooden deck.
sentences.cn: 粘在她鞋底的沙砾蹭在木甲板上发出刺耳的声音.

sentences.en: The soldiers showed that they had plenty of grit.
sentences.cn: 士兵们表现得很有勇气.

sentences.en: These units are employed as grit arrester on small cupola.
sentences.cn: 这种装置在小型冲天炉中是作为砂粒分离器使用的.

sentences.en: You'll never quite get rid of every last bit of grit.
sentences.cn: 无法把所有的沙砾都清除干净。

sentences.en: You've got to admire her grit.
sentences.cn: 你不得不佩服她的勇气。

words.tran_cn: 坚韧不拔的；有砂砾的；多沙的；像砂的

trans.tran_cn: 细沙，沙砾，<口>刚毅，坚韧，勇气
trans.tran_en: a type of grain that is roughly crushed and cooked, and often eaten for breakfast

trans.tran_cn: 下定决心， 咬紧牙关
trans.tran_en: to use all your determination to continue in spite of difficulties

trans.tran_cn: 发出轧轧声，轧，研磨，以沙砾覆盖（某物），撒沙砾于，咬紧牙关
